name: Beats Shooter
description:
Want to relax and have fun during your free time?
Enjoy this amazing and challenging retro arcade game: Beats Shooter!

Beats Shooter Gameplay:
1. Avoid enemies and collect energy boosts as you advance in this amazing neon world!
2. Swipe on the screen to shoot and defeat waves of enemies!
Complete the targets to upgrade!

Beats Shooter Features:
● Original and primordial soundtrack.
● Stunning neon graphics make the game even more challenging.
● Simple touch controls and a fast-paced gameplay!
● Each wave you complete will add points to your score!

Enter the stylish neon world, dodge and avoid geometric enemies and sprint to collect energy boosts! Install Beats Shooter now; accept the challenge of this amazing game!
